name: Jozankei View Hotel
description: Jozankei View Hotel offers breakfast/dinner buffets with a variety of dishes. Guests can enjoy an indoor hot-spring amusement park which includes in-door pools with water slides, spa baths and various hot-spring baths. A free shuttle is available from central Sapporo city, which is a 1-hour drive away and must be reserved at time of booking. All rooms are non-smoking rooms and the air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Japanese and Western buffets featuring seasonal and local ingredients are served at the restaurant. Japanese dishes are also served at the restaurant. Hotel Jozankei View is a 10-minute walk from Jozankei Gensen Park and a 45-minute drive from Sapporo International Ski Resort.

name: Jozankei Tsuruga Resort Spa Mori no Uta
description: Boasting natural hot springs with views of surrounding greenery, Jozankei Tsuruga offers elegant rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. It features a spa, buffet restaurant and reservation only free shuttles to Makomanai Station on the Sapporo Subway Lines. Jozankei Tsuruga Resort Spa Mori no Uta is 27 km from Sapporo Train Station and a 1.5-hour drive from Chitose Airport. Free parking is available. Featuring modern Japanese interiors, air-conditioned rooms offer spacious layouts and ample lounge area. They come with a hairdryer and a coffee maker. Dining options include hearty buffets meals served in the restaurant. Scenic forest views accompany fine teas at Mori Terrace. For leisure, guests can enjoy relaxing massages or make use of the free Wi-Fi available throughout. Added conveniences include 24-hour reception, a gift shop and cigar bar.

name: Mp Style Sapporo-37
address: 中央区南12条西8丁目1-24 1002, Sapporo 064-0912
description: Set in Minami-jūichijō in the Hokkaido region, with Susukino Station and Odori Park nearby, MP STYLE SAPPORO-37 offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, a microwave and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Sapporo Station is 4 km from the aparthotel, while Shin-Sapporo Station is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 11 km from MP STYLE SAPPORO-37.

name: Grand Blissen Hotel Jozankei
address: 北海道 札幌市南区定山渓温泉東4, Sapporo 061-2302
description: No description found

name: Jozankei Manseikaku Hotel Milione
description: Offering hot-spring baths, an indoor pool and Marco Polo Buffet Restaurant, Hotel Milione is 1 hour from Sapporo Train Station on the hotel’s free shuttle. Both Japanese rooms with tatami (woven-straw) flooring and futon beds and Western-style rooms are available at Jozankei Manseikaku Hotel Milione. All are air-conditioned and have a private bathroom with bathtub. Set in the wooded hills near Mount Asahi, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Futami Tsuribashi Suspension Bridge. Hoheikyo Dam is a 10-minute drive, and Jozankei Dam is a 20-minute drive. Guests can enjoy the nightclub, sing karaoke or relax at the sauna. Massages are available, and a gift shop is on site. Breakfast and dinner are served at the hotel’s restaurant. A Japanese-style pub and relaxed bar are also on offer.

name: Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom Sapporo Hotel and Spa Resort
description: Featuring several public baths and a sauna, the Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom Sapporo Hotel & Resort offers Western-style rooms with free wired internet access. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or enjoy the various indoor and outdoor swimming pools. JR Sapporo Station is a 45-minute drive, and the Shin-Chitose Airport is a 60-minute drive away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a TV, a refrigerator, and an electric kettle with tea bags. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and slippers. Guests can request for relaxing massages and facials, or get a haircut at the barbershop. The resort also has 9 kinds of hot spring baths and spas, as well as various types of saunas. The hotel provides 4 dining options. Vigne restaurant serves Western dishes, while Hyonmanro offers Chinese cuisine. Teppanyaki grill is available at the Kaiji, and Japanese food at the Daizen. Sapporo Hotel & Resort Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom is a 39-minute drive from the Sapporo Clock Tower, and a 41-minute drive from the famous Odori Park. Nakajima Park and Hoheikan is a 51-minute drive away.

name: Choinehotel Sapporo Teine - Hostel
description: Situated in Sapporo, within 7.9 km of Otarushi Zenibako City Center and 12 km of Sapporo Station, Choine Hotel Sapporo Teine features accommodation with a shared lounge and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring free bikes, the 1-star hostel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a shared bathroom. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All units in the hostel are fitted with a kettle. The rooms have bed linen. Guests at Choine Hotel Sapporo Teine can enjoy an American breakfast. Shin-Sapporo Station is 24 km from the accommodation, while Otaru Station is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 14 km from Choine Hotel Sapporo Teine.

name: Taketo Stay Kotoni
description: No description found

name: Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen
description: Situated in Jozankei, within 32 km of Sapporo Station and 37 km of Shin-Sapporo Station, Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests. The ryokan will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot spring bath. Guests at Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen will be able to enjoy activities in and around Jozankei, like skiing. The ryokan provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Otaru Station is 48 km from Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen, while Otarushi Zenibako City Center is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 40 km from the accommodation.

name: Chalet Ivy Jozankei
description: No description found

name: Suigan
description: No description found

name: One Living In
description: Located in Sapporo, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Sapporo Jyogai Market is within an easy 5-minute walk and Sapporo Crab Market is also a quick 6-minute walk away, so leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Sapporo by hopping on a metro at Nijuyonken Station, just a short 7-minute walk away. The kitchen is equipped with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a freezer, as well as a microwave, cookware, and a rice cooker. Enjoy the free WiFi and digital TV. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, a bidet, and towels. And because there's a washing machine, you can go a bit lighter on your packing.Expedia

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Sapporo
description: APA Hotel Sapporo offers luxurious facilities including a seafood restaurant and a variety of traditional body treatment areas like an Utatane-buro (nap bath) and a Rotenburo Bath (open-air bath). Free WiFi is available in all guest rooms. The hotel is about 7.2 km from Sapporo Art Park and 3.4 km from Sapporo Moiwayama Ski Resort. It takes 20 minutes by taxi from the hotel to Susukino Station and 15 minutes to Hitsujigaoka Observation Hill. There is a free bus which runs between the hotel and downtown Sapporo. The rooms at APA Hotel & Resort Sapporo are well equipped with heating and air conditioning facilities, a flat-screen TV with Video on Demand (VOD) system, and a work desk. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Enjoy fresh flame-grilled seafood in an authentic Hokkaido environment at Umie Restaurant. Drinks can be purchased at all times at vending machines. Guests can unwind in the sauna, enjoy a massage, or get active with a game of table tennis. Computers are available for rent, and there are internet terminals on site. Other facilities include a coin-operated laundry machine.

name: Jozankei Onsen Yurakusoan
description: No description found

name: Hotel Route-Inn Sapporo Shiroishi
description: Hotel Route-Inn Sapporo Shiroishi is located in Hokkaido, a 20-minute walk from JR Shiraishi Station. It offers modern accommodation with a public bath, free parking and rooms with free internet. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each well-appointed room has a fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. The hotel has a coin-operated laundrette. The lobby provides free usage of computers for guests’ convenience. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. The Hanahana Tei restaurant serves a Japanese dinner. It operates on weekdays only. Drinks and light snacks can be purchased from the vending machines on site. Inn Sapporo Shiroishi is located a 20-minute drive from the Susukino district, where many dining options are available.

name: Onsen Villa Clockless Jznk
address: Minami-Ku Jozankei Nishi2Chome45-1 Lions Mansion Sanbankan501, Sapporo 061-2303
description: Set in Sapporo in the Hokkaido region, 3月リニューアルオープン定山渓天然温泉ダブルベッドルーム付き貸切り別荘 ClocklessJZNK offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The accommodation features a sauna. Each unit is fitted with air conditioning, a private bathroom and a kitchen. The aparthotel offers 2-star accommodation with a hot spring bath and hot tub. Guests can also relax in the garden. Sapporo Station is 27 km from 3月リニューアルオープン定山渓天然温泉ダブルベッドルーム付き貸切り別荘 ClocklessJZNK, while Shin-Sapporo Station is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: Lit's Inn Sapporo
address: 中央区南５条西９丁目１０１４−４, Sapporo 064-0805
description: Located in Sapporo in the Hokkaido region, with Susukino Station and Odori Park nearby, LIT’S INN Sapporo provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The air-conditioned units have a fully equipped kitchen with dining area, a fridge, kettle, and a microwave. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Odori Station, Sapporo TV Tower and Sapporo Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 10 km from LIT’S INN Sapporo.

name: Hotel Vegas (Adult Only)
description: Hotel Vegas (Adult Only) is located in Sapporo, 10 km from Sapporo Station and 11 km from Otarushi Zenibako City Center. The 2-star love hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Kita-Juni-Jo Station is 9.3 km away and Hokkaido University is 10 km from the love hotel. The units in the love hotel are fitted with a kettle and a CD player. Guest rooms in Hotel Vegas (Adult Only) are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Shin-Sapporo Station is 22 km from Hotel Vegas (Adult Only), while Otaru Station is 28 km away. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 12 km from the love hotel.

name: Miidokoro House Hotel
description: No description found

name: Hotel Wheat Wacca
description: Located in Sapporo, 4.7 km from Sapporo Station, HOTEL WHEAT WACCA provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is set 12 km from Shin-Sapporo Station, 22 km from Otarushi Zenibako City Center and 39 km from Otaru Station. The hotel features family rooms. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. At the hotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. Susukino Station is 2.4 km from HOTEL WHEAT WACCA, while Sapporo TV Tower is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: B & B Yoshida
address: B&B Yoshida, Higashi-Ku Kita37-Johigashi 28-4-6, Sapporo City, Hokkaido, Japan, Sapporo 007-0837
description: Located 5 km from Sapporo Convention Centre, 民泊 B&B yoshida provides accommodation with a shared lounge, a garden and a shared kitchen for your convenience. Both WiFi and private parking are available at the bed and breakfast free of charge. All units are equipped with a microwave, fridge, a kettle, a oven and coffee machine. There is a shared bathroom with hot tub in every unit, along with slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries. 民泊 B&B yoshida offers a terrace. Skiing is possible within the area and the accommodation offers ski-to-door access. Hokkaido University is 5 km from 民泊 B&B yoshida, while Sapporo Clock Tower is 6 km away. The nearest airport is New Chitose Airport, 42 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Hostel Pleasure Maruyama
address: Chuo-Ku Kita1Jo Nishi28Chome1-15 Pleasure Maruyama, Sapporo 060-0821
description: Set 4 km from Sapporo Station, Hostel PLEASURE MARUYAMA offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, slippers and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Shin-Sapporo Station is 15 km from the aparthotel, while Otarushi Zenibako City Center is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 11 km from Hostel PLEASURE MARUYAMA.

name: Taketo Stay Terrace One
description: Conveniently set in Sapporo, TAKETO STAY TERRACE ONE provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and free private parking. This 1-star hotel offers a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.3 km from Sapporo Station. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near TAKETO STAY TERRACE ONE include Odori Park, Susukino Station and Odori Station. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.
